fixed_xml: <ITEM>Es verlangt jemand: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Suiceri</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Diction. graec.</TITLE> <FORMAT>4t√≤.</FORMAT></BIBL> und <BIBL><AUTHOR>Herodiani</AUTHOR> <TITLE>hist. cum not. Boecleri & Ind. Scheidii</TITLE></BIBL> zu kaufen, der Liebhaber ist im Berichthaus zu erfragen.</ITEM>
explanation: The XML was almost well-formed, but I had to replace the '&' character with its equivalent entity reference '&' to make it a well-formed XML. The '&' character is a reserved character in XML and it must be replaced with '&' when it does not function as the beginning of an entity reference.
